title: ‘Harry Potter’ Author JK Rowling Reveals Daniel Radcliffe Is Chinese?
subtitle: The claim that J.K. Rowling said "Harry Potter" actor Daniel Radcliffe is of Chinese heritage originated with the satirical web site ClickHole.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: "Harry Potter" creator J.K. Rowling revealed that lead film actor Daniel Radcliffe is Chinese.
